name: Will of the All-Hunter
originalText:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's blocking, instead put two +1/+1 counters on it.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

rulings.text: Once a creature blocks, it remains a blocking creature through the end of combat step, even if the attacking creature dies or leaves combat.
